name: Eleven(ish) Seconds To Gundown
description:
"It's eleven seconds to midday; time to settle the score with your nemesis once and for all. Unfortunately the town clock is on the blink, so you had better be ready to react when the clock chimes!"

Eleven(ish) Seconds To Gundown is a 1 vs 1 reaction based game - and a useful way to solve disputes between friends / relatives / associates.

Put together for The EGX & Rock Paper Shotgun Game Jam.
